openconnector
Class Item

java.lang.Object
  openconnector.Item

public class Item
extends java.lang.Object

A model for a single change request for an object. A list of these is found within a Request object.

          Operations describe how values should be applied when updating.

Field Detail

SecretAttributes

public static java.lang.String[] SecretAttributes
Item or argument names that can contain passwords that need to be hidden. The passwords are obvious, "current" is used to convey the current password in some password change requests. That's a little more ambiguous, a schema could in theory use "current" for something else, but we are only using this right now for plan debugging it does not matter.

Method Detail

setScope

public void setScope(java.lang.String s)
Set the scope of the attribute request. This is the name of an attribute whose values are complex types. Currently it is only used for attributes of type Permission. The request then becomes an add/remove/set operation on permission rights.

getScope

public java.lang.String getScope()
Returns:
the scope of the request.
